titleStmt.title: Vyākhyā by Ānandagiri on Bhāṣya of Śaṅkara on Brahmasūtra 4th Adhyāya

repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: The manuscript is incomplete. First 151 folio are missing.

msItem.title: caturthādhyāyaḥ ānandagiriyam śārīrikamīmāṃsābhāṣyaṭīkā
msItem.author: Ānandagiri
msItem.incipit: (152v 1) (gap of two letters due to broken corner.) yavicārāya saṃbandhaditi hetuhetumadlakṣaṇāsya gatiratibhāvaḥ anantarapādasyaāvāntarasaṅgatya
msItem.explicit:
278v 1 śrayaṇeneti upāsajānāmiśvarāya ttamaiśvaryyanna niratiśayamityadhikaraṇārthamupasaṃhartumitītyuktaṃ sūtrābhyāsasya prayojanamāha anāvṛttiśabdāditi yatrādhyāya[samā]
(278v 2) reva tatra padasyaivābhyāso dṛṣṭaḥ prakṛteḥ sūtrasyaivābhyāsāccaturlakṣaṇasya vedāntamīmāṃsāśāstrasyasamanvayāvirodhasādhana phalānāṃ sākalyenoktatvādvaktavyā nava
(278v 3) śeṣātparisamāpanamucitamiti bhāvaḥ …
msItem.finalRubric:
(278v 3) hariḥ oṃ śubhamastu iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryyaśrī
(278v 4) śuddhānandapujyapādaśiṣyabhagavadānandajñānakṛte śrīmatchāririkabhāṣyavibhāge nyāyanrṇaye caturthasyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ .. oṃ … samā (278v 5) ptā ceyaṃ śārirakabhāṣyaṭīkā śubhamastu

support.p: Palm leaf is used as support material. The front guard folio is broken at right side. Title is mentned on the front folio.

extent.measure: 3 guard folio 3 blank folio 152v- 278v 133 total folio. Folio 1-151v are missing.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerals in the left margin of the verso of the folio.

handNote.desc: Hand writing looks little different on folio 205, 206 etc.

additions.desc: Title on the front guard folio: caturthādhyāyaḥ ānandagiriyam śārīrikamīmāṃsābhāṣyaṭīkā

listBibl.bibl: Brahmasutra Sankarabhashya with Anandagiri Tika, in Two Parts, Part II (Anandashram Sanskrit Series) Dvaipayana Shastri Narayana, Anandashram Samskrita Granthavali (Poona) 1890.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to saperate words.

TEI.text:
(152v 1) (gap of two letters due to broken corner.) yavicārāya saṃbandhaditi hetuhetumadlakṣaṇāsya gatiratibhāvaḥ anantarapādasyaāvāntarasaṅgatya
(278v 1) śrayaṇeneti upāsajānāmiśvarāya ttamaiśvaryyanna niratiśayamityadhikaraṇārthamupasaṃhartumitītyuktaṃ sūtrābhyāsasya prayojanamāha anāvṛttiśabdāditi yatrādhyāya[samā]
(278v 2) reva tatra padasyaivābhyāso dṛṣṭaḥ prakṛteḥ sūtrasyaivābhyāsāccaturlakṣaṇasya vedāntamīmāṃsāśāstrasyasamanvayāvirodhasādhana phalānāṃ sākalyenoktatvādvaktavyā nava
(278v 3) śeṣātparisamāpanamucitamiti bhāvaḥ … hariḥ oṃ śubhamastu iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryyaśrī
(278v 4) śuddhānandapujyapādaśiṣyabhagavadānandajñānakṛte śrīmatchāririkabhāṣyavibhāge nyāyanrṇaye caturthasyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ .. oṃ … samā (278v 5) ptā ceyaṃ śārirakabhāṣyaṭīkā śubhamastu
